projectRootDescription: Set the directory that CodePilot will recognize as the top-level path of the project. This path can be used as a reference point when referencing file paths.
sourcePathDescription: This is a list of source code paths that CodePilot will reference when generating AI responses. The contents of specified files and folders can be provided as context to the AI.
autoUpdateDescription: Set whether to automatically update files based on code suggested by the LLM. When disabled, a confirmation message will be displayed before updating.
settingsSavedImmediately: Settings are saved immediately when changed.
geminiApiDescription: Set the Gemini API key to use CodePilot's AI features. You can get an API key from Google AI Studio.
geminiApiFunctionDescription: Enables AI code generation and analysis features.
externalApiKeysDescription: Set external API keys to use real-time information features. Get API keys from each service's website and enter them here.
weatherApiDescription: Provides accurate weather information for Korea. You can get an API key from the Korea Meteorological Administration API Hub.
newsApiDescription: Provides the latest news information from Korea. Register an application at Naver Developer Center and get Client ID and Client Secret.
stockApiDescription: Provides real-time stock information. You can get an API key from Alpha Vantage.
weatherApiKeyNotSet: Weather API key is not set.
newsApiKeySet: Naver API Client ID is set.
newsApiKeyNotSet: Naver API Client ID is not set.
newsApiSecretSet: Naver API Client Secret is set.
newsApiSecretNotSet: Naver API Client Secret is not set.
stockApiKeyNotSet: Stock API key is not set.
geminiApiKeyNotSet: Gemini API key is not set.
weatherApiKeyError: Failed to save weather API key:
newsApiKeySaved: Naver API Client ID saved successfully.
newsApiKeyError: Failed to save Naver API Client ID:
newsApiSecretSaved: Naver API Client Secret saved successfully.
newsApiSecretError: Failed to save Naver API Client Secret:
stockApiKeyError: Failed to save stock API key:
geminiApiKeyError: Failed to save Gemini API key:
